class_notes:
We will make special accommodations for online instruction for this course. Your instructor will communicate the mode of instruction before the start of classes.


If you need to request permission to enroll, please contact:  study@dmbi.emory.edu
course_description:
The course covers data interoperability, integrity, confidentiality and HIPAA issues, clinical
informatics, EMR, clinical decision support and imaging systems, radiomics and pathomics.
sections: Class Nbr: 5569, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 9a-12p, Instructor: G. Clifford, Status: Open
